pierreplansaheadspringletter.text: Hey @,^^I have a new deal with my suppliers this month, so if I'm lucky, they might deliver the summer seeds a day early! Isn't that great?^^Come on down the shop tomorrow to check, so you can plan ahead!^^-Pierre
pierreplansaheadsummerletter.text: Hey @,^^I have a new deal with my suppliers this month, so if I'm lucky, they might deliver the fall seeds a day early! Isn't that great?^^Come on down the shop tomorrow to check, so you can plan ahead!^^-Pierre
pierreplansaheadwinterletter.text: Hey @,^^I have a new deal with my suppliers this month, so if I'm lucky, they might deliver the spring seeds a day early! Isn't that great?^^Come on down the shop tomorrow to check, so you can plan ahead!^^-Pierre
